_sText:
### **Map Features**

1. Rock Climbing
2. Big Cage
3. Swimming Pool
4. Playground
5. Parking Lot
6. BasketBall
7. Solitary
8. Soccer (FootBall)
9. Warday Room
10. Separate Cell Opening
11. Hidden Weapons
12. Hidden Secrets
13. 2 Sniper Towers (Scout in each with 1009 ammo so it should look as 10/999)
14. Armory with Buyzone (set mp_buytime 9 so you can buy all round)
15. Infirmary (Heals 7 hp per sec)

### **Warday Room**

1. Only works if all cells remain closed (1 open disables)
2. Having sm_disarm and sm_weapon should force teams to a knife (m4's and ak's inside war)
3. Warns users when warday is going to start
4. Button located above first cell
